system.note: Can only be wielded by Tyranids, weapon usually dies when the tyranid it is fused to dies. Some versions hose Brain Leech Worms, which increase damage to 2d10+6 R and deal one additional point of Cohesion Damage.

description.value:
Special: Living Ammunition, Storm, Tearing

Note: Can only be wielded by Tyranids, weapon usually dies when the tyranid it is fused to dies. Some versions hose Brain Leech Worms, which increase damage to 2d10+6 R and deal one additional point of Cohesion Damage.
